channel.title: Starting New Server!
channel.description:
Hello my name is Bonzakid and I have previously made these servers (You might of not heard of them before). SeaScape V1, SeaScape V3.0, UnbornFury, FirePhoenixScape and my first one i ever made "AncientScape" Until someone stole the name back this year previously..
I am starting a new server up again and need your help! If you would like to help me accomplish with this new server it would be wonderful and people will love it!
I am planning on making this server an enjoyable one where people can PK and skill. People can do other features and enjoy the game and do minigame(s). There will be events being held on the server.
[code]Owner - Bonzakid
Positons Available =============== Administrator - Open Player Moderator - Open Player Moderator - Open Player Moderator - Open BETA Tester - Open BETA Tester - Open BETA Tester - Open BETA Tester - Open Forum Admin - Open Forum Moderator - Open Website Maker - Open Coder - Open Coder - Open Coder - Open[/code]
Please fill out the application below if you would like to join up in our community.
[code]Name: Age: If you want to be a coder, What experience do you have. Please give an example: Any Suggestions for the new Server Name: What position are you going for: Do you have any ideas which are unique that we could try and put in the server: What experience have you had in any of the position(s) you are going for:[/code]

item.title: Starting New Server!
item.dc:creator: @Twizler Twizler
item.description:
@Twizler wrote:

Name:Christian
Age:14
If you want to be a coder, What experience do you have. Please give an example: N/A
Any Suggestions for the new Server Name: Toxiscape? Super Happy Fun Fun Scape?
What position are you going for: admin
Do you have any ideas which are unique that we could try and put in the server: hm…custom weapons if possible? monsters with low hp but lower drops, ones with higher hp and better drops
What experience have you had in any of the position(s) you are going for: ive been mods and admins of forums…lol. but i like helping and interacting with players

Read full topic

item.title: Starting New Server!
item.dc:creator: @Tyrael Tyrael
item.description:
@Tyrael wrote:

Just an idea for you. Add what you are planning on making on this server, if its going to be dedicated. Some pieces of code you have made so people join your Development team.
-tyrael-

Read full topic

item.title: Starting New Server!

@bonzakid wrote:

Hello my name is Bonzakid and I have previously made these servers (You might of not heard of them before).
SeaScape V1, SeaScape V3.0, UnbornFury, FirePhoenixScape and my first one i ever made “AncientScape” Until someone stole the name back this year previously…

I am starting a new server up again and need your help! If you would like to help me accomplish with this new server it would be wonderful and people will love it!

I am planning on making this server an enjoyable one where people can PK and skill. People can do other features and enjoy the game and do minigame(s). There will be events being held on the server.
